portfolio.title: NUS Cartographers
portfolio.description: Developed a unique mapping software that maps and generates routes, along with list of amenities and other useful features for the entirety of School of Computing buildings. Pathfinding from one room to another made easy!

portfolio.title: Autonomous Traversal Robot
portfolio.description: Built a robot with a turtlebot kit, that uses a Lidar, OpenCR and RaspberryPi4, along with color sensor to autonomously navigate a maze and deposit 5 balls in a checkpoint.

portfolio.title: Alex the RObot
portfolio.description: Built a robot with ArduinoMega, RaspberryPi and LiDAR that is remote controlled and able to move using an xbox controller
